title: Unsportsmanlike players and hidden usernames
body: This afternoon i played a mid lane matchup of me(Katarina) vs a swell fellow going by, ehhem, . Most people from our team reported him for racism and intentional feeding, but alas he isn't banned. In the match he claimed to have masked his username with an unapproved program. is this very common (among the scripting community at least)?

replies.body: Wait, nvm, the ban just took forever to take place. Please disregard.

Good job looking out for your fellow Summoners and reporting those offensive names!!! It may take a little while to get to them sometimes, but rest assured we're on the job ^_^!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
